article: ingredients : 1 bag tortilla chips1 bag fritos scoops12 ounces monterey jack cheese , shredded 12 ounces sharp cheddar cheese , shredded 1 can refried beans1 can black beans , drained 1/2 pound ground beef , cooked with 1 packet of taco seasoning1 poblano pepper , seeded and cut into thin strips1 medium spanish onion , finely chopped1 jar taco sauce1 1/2 cups salsa2 cups sour cream1 jar pickled sliced jalapeños , drained6 scallions , thinly sliced1 1/2 cups frozen corn kernels , thawed2 avocados , chopped1 cup coarsely chopped cilantrodirections : preheat oven to divide the tortilla chips and fritos between two rimmed half sheet pans .

top the chips evenly with the monterey jack and cheddar cheeses , then add the refried beans and black beans , the taco-seasoned ground beef , poblano pepper , and for 3 to 6 minutes , until the cheese is melted and the cheese and chips start to brown around the from the oven and top with the taco sauce , salsa , sour cream , jalapeños , scallions , corn , avocado , and cilantro . serve immediately .
